title: fix: align --display explanation in help message

body:
Broken "." position was fixed like this.

Before:

```
        --display <display>  when in X mode, connect to the X server
                               at <display>
  .      --no-xinitthreads    do not call XInitThreads()
```

After:

```
        --display <display>  when in X mode, connect to the X server
                               at <display>.
        --no-xinitthreads    do not call XInitThreads()
```
Thanks, you beat me to it!

Related: https://github.com/deskflow/deskflow/issues/7680

In this PR, focus on trivial cosmetic change.
